Title: The Distance
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Seth Hoffman
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Steven Yeun, Lauren Cohan
Plot: Recovering from a devastating storm, Rick and the group find themselves mistrustful of a new survivor who promises them safety in a walled-off community.
